content:
Preparing to Use Service Resource Preferences

After setting up service resource preferences, agents specify their desired workdays and times. Planners assign shifts considering these preferences using the scheduling tools.

Workforce Engagement is available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions.
Shift Scheduling is available in Contact Center SKU, Einstein 1 Service Edition, and Service Suites.

To enable service resource preferences:

1. Assign the Shift Scheduling Agent or Workforce Engagement Agent permission set to users who create service resource preferences.
2. Create a service resource for each agent submitting a preference.
3. Add the Preferences related list to the service resource object.
4. Give planners View All permissions on Service Resource Preferences.
5. Allow agents to view their own Service Resource records using an Apex trigger.
6. Set up a scheduling objective that considers agents' preferences, such as Maximized Preferences.

Let us know if this solved your issue!
title: Preparing Service Resource Preferences in Salesforce
